metadata.Title: CVE-2020-6530 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Out of bounds memory access in developer tools in Google Chrome prior to84.0.4147.89 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install amalicious extension to potentially exploit heap corruption via a craftedChrome Extension.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
